triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: The paper evaluates vision-based large language models as the primary subject of study.

triples.name: Deep learning
triples.relevance: The paper discusses limitations of deep neural network architectures in cognitive reasoning tasks.

triples.name: Causal reasoning
triples.relevance: Causal reasoning is one of the three main cognitive domains evaluated in the paper.

triples.name: Naïve physics
triples.relevance: Intuitive physics (naïve physics) is one of the three main cognitive domains tested in the evaluation.

triples.name: Theory of mind
triples.relevance: Theory of mind and intuitive psychology are evaluated to assess model understanding of social cognition.

triples.name: Multimodal learning
triples.relevance: Multimodal learning is the core technique enabling vision-based large language models.

triples.name: Visual perception
triples.relevance: Visual cognition and perception is the focus domain of the paper's investigation.

triples.name: Language model benchmark
triples.relevance: The paper proposes cognitively inspired benchmarks for evaluating visual reasoning in language models.
